mutants.original_line: """Helper function to check if a number is prime."""
"""Return True if all elements at prime indices in the array are prime numbers."""
return all(is_prime(array[i]) for i in range(2, len(array)) if is_prime(i))
mutants.mutated_line: return all((is_prime(array[i]) for i in range(3, len(array)) if is_prime(i)))
